example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 其间)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VE 有) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 两) (CLP (M 个))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 体重)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 轻)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 婴儿))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不幸)) (VP (VV 夭折))))))
